general.where_info: Set where you want to use discussion cards.
general.allowedTags_help: Discussion cards will be activated and shown for the selected tags pages.
general.onIndexPage_label: Activate cards on the Index Page
general.onIndexPage_help: If activated, the all discussions page will show cards.
general.primaryCardOptions_info: Set if and how you want to use primary cards (bigger cards at the top of each page using discussion cards). 0 for none.
general.primaryCards_help: Number of bigger cards shown at the top of each page using discussion cards. (positive number 0 or more)
general.desktopCardWidth_help: Set the width (in %) of the primary cards on desktop. (between 10 and 100)
general.tabletCardWidth_help: Set the width (in %) of the primary cards on tablets. (between 10 and 100)
general.cardOptions_info: Set what data/infos should be shown on the cards.
general.defaultImage_info: Here you can change the default image to be used on cards when none is found in the discussion's first message. IMPORTANT: note that changing the image will discard any other unsaved settings changes you made and will reload the page automatically. Please save your changes before changing the image (or vice versa ðŸ˜‰). Accepted formats: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP or WebP files. Ideal resolution: 400px x 225px (all uploaded images will be converted to a PNG file and resized to a width of 400px, except for images with smaller width, which will keep there initial resolution, and won't be upscaled). Depending on your file's resolution, the image could be shown cropped and/or stretched on cards.
general.previewText_help: If activated, shows the start of the first message as a preview on the card.
general.showAuthor_help: If activated, shows the author of the discussion on the cards.
general.showReplies_help: If activated, shows the number of replies on the cards (and the avatars of a some participants in the discussion on primary cards).
general.showBadges_help: If activated, shows badges at the top left corner of the cards.
general.markReadCards_help: If activated, read discussions will have a black & white filter on their cards (image & tags), whereas unread discussions will be in full colors.
general.otherOptions_info: The following options will require other extensions to be installed and activated for them to work. IMPORTANT: please read all the info for each individual option and do the required steps before activating it.
general.showViews_help: Must have the Flarumite Simple Discussion Views extension installed and activated. If option enabled, shows the number of views on the cards.

tags.defaultImage_info: Set or change the default card image for this tag's page. See the Discussion Cards general settings for details on accepted file formats & resolutions.

tag_modal.title: Discussion Card Settings for
tag_modal.intro_text: Here you can set different discussion cards settings for the current tag's page.
tag_modal.primaryCards_help: Number of bigger cards shown at the top of the page (global setting : {default}, min: 0).
tag_modal.desktopCardWidth_help: Set the width (in %) of the primary cards on desktop (global setting: {default}%, min: 10% & max: 100%).
tag_modal.tabletCardWidth_help: Set the width (in %) of the primary cards on tablets (global setting: {default}%, min: 10% & max: 100%).

errors.primaryCards: Number of primary cards must be a positive number (0 or greater)
errors.desktopCardWidth: Primary cards width on desktop must be a number between 10 and 100
errors.tabletCardWidth: Primary cards width on tablets must be a number between 10 and 100
